tool_description: It is showing all the latest climate  around the world
title: Climate Change News

api_list.name: Get Individual news from source
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-news57.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-news57.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all climate Change news
api_list.description: this endpoint will return all  climate all over the world
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-news57.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-news57.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
